Plot: Computer scientist Hannon Fuller has discovered something extremely important. He's about to tell the discovery to his colleague, Douglas Hall, but knowing someone is after him, the old man...
Title: The Thirteenth Floor
Writer: Daniel F. Galouye (book), Josef Rusnak (screenplay), Ravel Centeno-Rodriguez (screenplay)
Actors: Craig Bierko, Armin Mueller-Stahl, Gretchen Mol, Vincent D'Onofrio
tomatoConsensus: Bad script and confusing plot undermine the movie's impressive visuals.
